title: 如何看待伊朗衛生部副部長感染武漢肺炎並表態？
contents:
https://www.theguardian.com/world/2020/feb/25/irans-deputy-health-minister-i-have-coronavirus

Feverish Iraj Harirchi says disease ‘doesn’t distinguish between statesman and ordinary citizen’
該部長表態：疾病傳染不分官員和平民。
